comments.body: Perhaps in a follow-up, I'd recommend just returning `err` and modifying `pkg/kubelet/dockertools/manager.go` to call `os.IsNotExist(err)` instead of checking for `os.ErrNotExist`.
This logic has grown organically complex. Your suggestion makes sense. Although, this whole logic will be removed once we can drop support for docker versions < v1.10.
10 seems quite high - is that intentional?
Yeah. Its because of the inherent race between starting a container and applying oom score asynchronously.
